# GCInputRightThumbstick

**Global Variable**

The name of the right thumbstick element.

## Declaration

```swift
var GCInputRightThumbstick: String { get }
```

## Related Documentation

- **rightThumbstick**: The controller’s right thumbstick element.

## Thumbstick names

- **GCInputLeftThumbstick**: The name of the left thumbstick element.
- **GCInputLeftThumbstickButton**: The name of the left thumbstick button element.
- **GCInputRightThumbstickButton**: The name of the right thumbstick button element.
